dataset_name: Collocation Points for FEM Validation and Surrogate Modeling
description: Strategically selected subset of full-field FEM data for residual analysis and surrogate model training

selection_criteria.description: Points on the free surface where thermal gradients are highest
Free surface points with von Mises stress > 100 MPa
Points within 10 μm of pore boundaries (stress concentrators)
Near-pore points with von Mises stress > 110 MPa
Near-pore points with von Mises stress > 150 MPa (crack initiation sites)
Critical near-pore points with von Mises stress > 180 MPa
Points within 1 μm of grain boundaries
Grain boundary points with von Mises stress > 150 MPa
Grain boundary points with von Mises stress > 170 MPa
Interior points away from defects for baseline measurements
Interior points with elevated stress levels > 135 MPa

use_cases: Training surrogate models (Neural Networks, Gaussian Processes, POD-RBF)
Residual analysis to identify model inaccuracies

recommended_train_test_split.notes: Ensure validation points cover all location types proportionally
